item.description:
The Greater Boston Stop the Wars Coalition will be organizing the Fifth annual First Night Against the Wars on December 31 in Copley Square. As Washington escalates the war against Afghanistan, protests were organized on Wednesday in scores of cities across the U.S. Our task remains to educate, organize, and mobilize opposition to the war drive and demand that all the occupations be ended. Please join us in planning our First Night activity this year.

Monday, 7 December, 6:00â€“7:00 PM
Encuentro 5
33 Harrison Ave, 5th Floor
Boston, MA (Chinatown)
(Chinatown stop on the Orange Line T, Boylston stop on the Green Line T)
item.name: Antiwar Meetup
